name: Gorilla King
description:
"Dang Kang Ding Dong"

GK demands you JUMP over the Barrels. Steal GK's coins...

Is: 2P Competetive or CO-OP Arena Platformer

UPDATE 01. 5/22/17

Expanded CO-OP mode! P2 controller fixes.

----------------------------------------------------------

Platform theory is explored in various single-screen formats. Using derivatives homage you play as Maria and Louis [Jump-Kids] collecting coins. Mind the shoddy controls and unfair collision boxes! Also avoid spikes, hop over minions and avoid the thrill of murdicide, And don't step in lava. JumpJumpForever.

----------------------------------------------------------

Game modes:

Versus - 2P compete in four rounds to collect the coins

CO-OP - 2P collect the coins together to advance thru 4 levels

Time Trial - 1P beat the clock to play hardmode

Tutorial - experimenting how to "how to" stuff.

SUPER DEMO MODE...

----------------------------------------------------------

Gamepad [XBOX] support, keyboard controls.

Red - Arrows/Pad1

Green- WASD/Pad2 

----------------------------------------------------------

Built with:

Construct 2, PyxelEdit, Bxfr, Photoshop

----------------------------------------------------------

*Just trying to get some good UI and game loop practice in.

Thanks for playing!
